price: ߊߟߎ߯ ߛߎߡߊ߲ߠߌ߲ߟߊ߲ ߟߊߛߋ߫ ߸ ߊߟߎ߫ ߞߊߣߊ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߕߊ߲ߓߏ߲ߕߏߟߊ ߟߎ߬ ߝߋ߲߫ ߘߌ߫ ߘߋ߬
arabic: ۞ أَوۡفُواْ ٱلۡكَيۡلَ وَلَا تَكُونُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡمُخۡسِرِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: awfū al-kayla walā takūnū mina al-mukh'sirīna
